Subject: Chimaera emerges
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: Unknown sub 103

    He crawled from beneateh the earths crust. He had been trapped there 
since the crash. He was the ultimate weapon. As his claw broke through the 
ground to the surface the surronding dirt exploded upwards.....Spawned by 
Typhoeus and Echidna,  Chimaera had three heads - lion, goat, and snake . His 
body was also mixed having the front part of a lion, middle of a goat, and 
snake for a tail. He breathed fire. He walked towards the nearest destron 
base.....
